verses.text: Aljokab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová, aton tz'ak'an wip. Aton wal tzin k'ayb'ani, syak'anpax in jelanil yic wach' swak' owal.
Aton icha in nhak'een, icha wal in cuartel, in Kolumal paxi. A' tzin k'ub'aneli. A' ayoch wenhuloc. A' tz'ak'anoch heb' chonhab' t'a yalanh in mandar.
Mamin Jehová ¿tas wal jab'oc quelk'och a onh anima onh tik t'a yol a sat, yuj chi' tzonh a nacoti? ¿Tas wal quelk'ochi yuj chi' tzonh a ya'ilej?
Ha onh anima onh tik, lajan onh icha wal b'aj squik' quik', haxo ko k 'inal icha wal junok enhul tz'eq'ui.
Mamin, jac spuertail satcha’anh yic tzach emuli. Tzach emul t'a jolomtac witz yic sk'e stab'il lum uuj.
Julemta junok a jul-lab', aton jun k'ak' tzek' copnajoc, tza pechanb'at heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach t'a skal somk'olal.
Masanto t'a satcha’anh chi' tzak'emta a k'ab' tzin a colanel t'a jun ha' mar te niwan, syalelk'ochi, aton heb' ch'oc chonhab'il.
Colinel t'a heb' esalwum chi', aton heb' syik'chaanh sk'ab' syak'an sti' t'a tastac manh yeloc.
Ach in Diosal, ol in b'itej jun ak' b'it t'ayach. Ol in b'itan yet' sb'ital salterio t'ayach.
Uuj wal, syal yuj heb' rey, a ach ton ix in a col t'a k'een espada tzonh milanchamoc, a in Dawid a chekab' in tik.
Ha ticnaik, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ch'oc chonhab'il, heb' esalwum syak' sti' t'a tastac manh yeloc syala'.
Q'uib'okab' heb' cuninal icha wal tas tz'avchaj to ya ilab'il. Ha heb' ix quisil lajanokab' heb' ix icha junok yoyal templo tzeyb'il, te wach' yilji.
Ha ko pat, b'ud'jinacokab'el yuj junjun makan wael. Ha nok' ko kalnel, q'uib'okab' sb'isul nok' t'a smilal. Manhxo b'ischajb'enokab' tz'aj sb'isul nok' ko wakax.
Unewiokab' nok', mokab' tonhejoc tzek' sti' nok'. Malajokab' mach tz'el yav t'a yol skalleal ko chonhab' yuj yaelal.
Yelxo wal te wach' yic junok chonhab' to icha chi' yaji. Yelxo wal te wach' yic junok chonhab' to a Jehová ayoch sDiosaloc.
